name: The Sydney Front
biography: Existed 1987-94, and was regarded by many as the most important performance group in Australia. The core members were, Andrea Eloise, John Baylis, Clare Grant, Nigel Kellaway and Christopher Ryan. Works included; Waltz, John Laws-Sade, The Pornography of Performance, Photocopies of God, Don Juan, First and Last Warning and Passion. They have toured Australia, Hong Kong and Europe.
